items.sentence: I can't imagine that they'll fire me for doing that.
It looks like you're having the same problems I had.
At this point, we don't know what's going to happen.
If you resist arrest, I'll be required to use force.
Even though Tom lives nearby, I hardly ever see him.
I didn't know Tom was supposed to do that yesterday.
I didn't know that Tom wanted to do that by himself.
I didn't know that Tom didn't have to do that today.
Would it be OK if I told Tom he didn't have to come?
The point is that we need be more careful next time.
I got up to leave, but Tom told me to sit back down.
I sat back down at my computer and got back to work.
Brush the snow off your coat before you come inside.
I wasn't able to come because of the heavy snowfall.
It's necessary for you to go and encourage the girl.
They're now investigating the cause of the accident.
Tom saw Mary\'s car parked in front of John\'s house.
Do you know why spring rolls are called spring rolls?
Do you really need to go out in this kind of weather?
Do you really think Tom can convince Mary to do that?
Do you really think Tom will let you dance with John?
Do you really think you can convince Tom to help you?
Do you really think you can do that without any help?
It irritates Mary when Tom leaves the toilet seat up.
It is important for everything to be ready by Monday.
It looks like Tom is waiting for someone to help him.
It looks quite different around here than it used to.
I wonder why you would say something like that to me.
Tom knows a woman who doesn\'t like to eat chocolate.
Tom knows that it\'s dangerous to play with scissors.
Let\'s wait until everyone comes out before we go in.
Life doesn\'t always work out the way you want it to.
Tom hates it when Mary pretends to understand sports.
Tom is always complaining about how much Mary spends.
Tom is always complaining about one thing or another.
Tom is more intelligent than most people think he is.
Recently, we\'ve been getting a lot of new customers.
Tom said that he had been cleaning the house all day.
You can never tell how long these meetings will last.
Tom occasionally visited Mary at her parents\' house.
I carried one bag, but the other one was left behind.
I did everything in my power to protect her from you.
I\'ll let you know as soon as we\'ve made a decision.
I\'m beginning to understand why you don\'t like Tom.
I\'m convinced that Tom isn\'t telling us everything.
Thank you very much for coming all the way to see me.
The coat she said she wanted was extremely expensive.
The last person I told my idea to thought I was nuts.
The new teacher is more like a friend than a teacher.
The only place Tom has ever wanted to live is Boston.
